tool_description: A simple component helping with IP functionalities
name: IP Utils
title: IP Utils

api_list.name: getMyIp
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mark-sutuer-ip-utils.p.rapidapi.com/api.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mark-sutuer-ip-utils.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
